name: alexa-solar-handler
description: Alexa skill handler for solar data

scripts.prepare-dist: npm run clean && npm run build && cp package.json package-lock.json dist/
scripts.package: npm run prepare-dist && npm run install-prod-deps && npm run create-zip
scripts.package-windows: npm run prepare-dist && npm run install-prod-deps && cd dist && powershell Compress-Archive -Path .\* -DestinationPath ..\lambda-package.zip -Force && cd ..
scripts.//package-info: Cleans, copies src/* to dist/src/*, copies manifests to dist/, installs prod deps in dist/, zips content of dist/
